MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH37, EH38, TD1 and TD2 postcode areas of Pathhead, Herriot, Galashiels and Lauder. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:46am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations into reports of grounded overhead line equipment and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:18am on 20th January
